sections.description:
Yng.Dev. brings you for free a widget / module to display categories and posts with descriptions, media and links, in a variety of layouts with many customizable options.

Some content display plugins and CMS do not highlight categories as much as posts. But that could be practicle for a better organization, structure, search engine optimization and a better understanding of the front and backoffice from clients and users.

Mr.Cat. makes it easier and faster to display categories and have your websites structured in ways such as:

Page with categories > Category page with posts > Post
